data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Neamț, Romania the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Neamț, Romania
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Neamț, Romania a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 382,750 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Neamț, Romania a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking people.
Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Neamț, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Neamț, Romania to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.section_summary:
the state of Neamț, Romania has a population of 438,300.

We estimate Neamț has 27,743 people who might know Jesus, 382,750 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 27,807 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 15 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Neamț, Romania.
